ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(OwnerId),OR( Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OSS South', Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OSS North',Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OSS East',Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OS Eastern', Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OSS West', Owner:Queue.QueueName ='Automotive - Support', Owner:Queue.QueueName ='EP - System Support', Owner:Queue.QueueName ='UTS - Energy', Owner:Queue.QueueName ='UTS - Grain', Owner:Queue.QueueName ='UTS - Transportation' ), NOT(ISCHANGED(NS_Last_Activity_Time__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(NS_Counter_Activity__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Transfers to this Queue are no longer Allowed.
